name: listWebinarTemplates
description:
When you schedule a webinar, you can save the settings for that webinar as a template for scheduling future webinars.

Use this API to list a user's existing [Webinar templates'](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115001079746-Webinar-Templates) information. **Prerequisites:** * Pro or a higher account with Webinar plan enabled.
